projects.text: This chrome extension overrides the default "New Tab", and replaces it with a Czech word and it's definition.

projects.title: Chat program
projects.text: This is a chat program, that allows the user to login with their Google account, and then chat. It is built with React, Socket, and Firebase.

projects.text: This is a website with animated counters for followers and subscribers on social media.

projects.title: User form
projects.text: This basic user form is a plain form sample that I created in my first month of coding.

projects.title: Tracalorie
projects.text: This is an app you can use to track all calories you put into your mouth. Every time you eat something, you just type it in there, and it will calculate the total amount for you.
